title: Backpacking Through Southeast Asia: A 3-Month Itinerary
body: Planning a trip to Southeast Asia? Here's a detailed itinerary based on my incredible 3-month backpacking adventure. I cover everything from visa tips to must-see sights and budget accommodation.

comments.body: This is so helpful! I'm planning a similar trip next year. Did you encounter any issues with transportation between countries?
Thanks for sharing! What was your approximate daily budget?
Any recommendations for off-the-beaten-path cultural experiences?
